definition: careless, negligent, slipshod/see 邋遢[la1 ta5]

sentences.english: Does she always dress that badly?
sentences.chinese: 她總是穿得那麼邋遢的嗎？

sentences.english: There are always some beggars dressed in filthly clothes hanging around the subway stations.
sentences.chinese: 在地鐵車站總有一些穿戴邋遢衣服的要飯的人停留。

sentences.english: For all these noble reasons and more, sloppy people never get neat.
sentences.chinese: 因爲所有這些高貴之處，邋遢的人從來就沒有整潔過。

sentences.english: The drowsy browser knits its brows to browbeat the frowzy crow.
sentences.chinese: 昏昏欲睡的喫草動物皺眉頭恐嚇邋遢的烏鴉。

sentences.english: Better a bachelor's life than a slovenly wife.
sentences.chinese: 過光棍生活，勝過有一個邋遢老婆。

sentences.english: Two girls raggedy as rats live across the street.
sentences.chinese: 兩個像老鼠一樣邋遢的女孩住在街對面。

sentences.english: The boys looked pretty raunchy after a night of drinking.
sentences.chinese: 男孩們在喝了一夜的酒之後看起來很邋遢。

sentences.english: He looked like he was some slob having a beer at a baseball game. Embarrassing.
sentences.chinese: 看起來就像個棒球賽裏灌着啤酒邋邋遢遢的笨蛋。

sentences.english: People expected revolutionaries to be bearded and unkempt .
sentences.chinese: 人們認爲革命者都是滿臉鬍鬚，邋里邋遢的。

sentences.english: She had the scruffiness befitting the circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 她的邋遢正好適合當時的情景。

sentences.english: Scruffily dressed person is wearing dirty and untidy clothes.
sentences.chinese: 一名穿着邋遢的人穿着又髒又不整潔的衣服。

sentences.english: When your clothes look sloppy, so do you.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的衣服看起來邋遢，那麼你也一樣。

sentences.english: Slovenliness is no part of religion.
Sloppy people live in Never-Never Land.
sentences.chinese: 邋遢的人生活在不真實的理想世界裏。

sentences.english: She will not allow anyone to see her dressed down.
sentences.chinese: 她不會讓別人看到她邋里邋遢的一面。

sentences.english: His uses of grungy textured backgrounds and typography are unmistakable.
sentences.chinese: 他通常使用邋遢風格的紋理背景和清楚無誤的版式。

definition: not care about one's appearance (idiom)/slovenly in dress and manner
messy hair and dirty face/bad appearance
to decorate/to dress/to make up/to adorn/manner of dressing/style of dress
with dishevelled hair (idiom)/with one's hair down
